AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Juventino Mejia-Orosco: Defendant convicted of illegally transporting aliens into the United States
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States District Court: Court that imposed sentence on Juventino Mejia-Orosco and calculated the sentence according to the guidelines promulgated by the United States Sentencing Commission
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Sentencing Commission: Promulgated guidelines for sentencing used by the district court in calculating Juventino Mejia-Orosco's sentence
